hadiths.text: Narrated Mu'awiyah ibn AbuSufyan: The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) forbade to ride on panther skins and to wear gold except a little. Abu Dawud said: The narrator Abu Qilabah did not meet Mu'awiyah

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الذَّهَبِ لِلنِّسَاءِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Reported About Gold For Women
